seo: Atlassian Jira,身份验证绕过,CVE-2022-0540,漏洞检测
summary: 该插件用于检测Atlassian Jira中的身份验证绕过漏洞（CVE-2022-0540），通过发送特定请求来确认是否存在漏洞。
summary_en: This plugin is used to detect the authentication bypass vulnerability (CVE-2022-0540) in Atlassian Jira by sending specific requests to confirm if the vulnerability exists.
